email_body: where are you getting those numbers? slafontaine@globalp.com on 03/26/2001 12:56:07 PM To: jarnold@enron.com cc: Subject: power gen while we're stroking each other on the bear stuff-you notice the weekly y on y power gen /demand numbers have fallen from double digit increases each week to now nearly flat to +2% ish each week depstie cold east and hot west.
